home_description: I invite you to explore my portfolio
about_body: Here you will find more information about me, what I do, and my current skills mostly in terms of programming and technology
about_content1p1: Hello I'm a dedicated and enthusiastic student in the field of computer science. I'm deeply passionate about problem-solving and creating practical solutions. Through my studies, I'm constantly expanding my knowledge and skills, driven by the desire to apply them to real-world projects.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: The aim of this project is to design and develop a personal portfolio website that serves as a digital representation of my skills and personality. I want it to be aesthetically pleasing, user-friendly, and responsive across various devices and screen sizes.

projects.name: Room Reservation System
projects.description: A project created for the MOPT as part of the educational process at the National University of Costa Rica (UNA)
